title: ZZ TOP Announces 2025 US Tour
author: Greg Kennelty
byline: By Greg Kennelty Published 5 hours ago
text: ZZ Top will kick off The Elevation Tour in early 2025. The tour kicks off on March 5 at the Dothan Civic Center in Dothan, AL and will wrap up on April 12 at the East Arkansas Community College in Forrest City, AR. Get your tickets here. 3/5 Dothan Civic Center Dothan, AL3/6 Saenger Theatre Mobile, AL3/9 Pompano Beach Amphitheater Pompano Beach, FL3/10 Barbara B. html:
ZZ Top will kick off The Elevation Tour in early 2025. The tour kicks off on March 5 at the Dothan Civic Center in Dothan, AL and will wrap up on April 12 at the East Arkansas Community College in Forrest City, AR. Get your tickets here.

3/5 Dothan Civic Center Dothan, AL
3/6 Saenger Theatre Mobile, AL
3/9 Pompano Beach Amphitheater Pompano Beach, FL
3/10 Barbara B. Mann Performing Arts Hall Fort Myers, FL
3/12 Seminole Hard Rock Hotel & Casino Tampa Tampa, FL
3/14 St. Augustine Amphitheatre St. Augustine, FL
3/18 Anderson Music Hall Hiawassee, GA
3/19 North Charleston Performing Arts Center North Charleston, SC
3/21 Crown Theatre Fayetteville, NC

3/23 Montgomery Performing Arts Centre Montgomery, AL

3/28 SKyPAC Bowling Green, KY

4/2 Blue Gate Performing Arts Center Shipshewana, IN
4/3 FIM Capitol Theatre Flint, MI
4/5 State Farm Center Champaign, IL
4/6 The Riverside Theatre Milwaukee, WI
4/8 Andrew J Brady Music Center Cincinnati, OH
4/11 Show Me Center Cape Girardeau, MO
4/12 East Arkansas Community College Forrest City, AR
